skinhair.title: R + F Lash Boost
skinhair.description: #1 Premium Lash Serum in the U.S. in 2021!* Our famous lash conditioning serum is applied nightly to promote the appearance of longer, stronger and darker-looking lashes (or brows!)
skinhair.details: What it is: A nightly eyelash conditioning serum infused with technology to enhance the appearance of length, volume + definition of eyelashes and eyebrows. Why you need it: Lash durability can be enhanced with proper moisture and protection against breakage. Condition your eyebrows and eyelashes to achieve youthful, fuller-looking definition. *Source Euromonitor International Limited; Beauty and Personal Care 2022 Edition, retail value RSP terms; all channels; Lash Serum including Lash Serum products sold as part of Sets and Kits.

skinhair.title: REDEFINE + Lash Boost Special
skinhair.description: Ditch wrinkles + mascara. Our best selling anti-aging skincare routine pairs with our famous conditioning eyelash serum for younger-looking skin and eyes.
skinhair.details: What it is: Save 20% when you bundle the REDEFINE Regimen with R+F Lash Boost! Visibly lift, sculpt + firm skin while promoting longer, fuller, darker-looking lashes. Why you need it: Fine lines, deep wrinkles and sparse lashes + brows are all key signs of aging. Attain more elastic, youthful-looking skin plus conditioned and moisturized lashes + brows.

skinhair.title: REVERSE + Lash Boost Special
skinhair.description: Leave dull skin + mascara in the past. Diminish visible discoloration while promoting fuller, longer, darker-looking lashes with this dynamic duo.
skinhair.details: What it is: Save 20% when you bundle the REVERSE Regimen with R+F Lash Boost! Combat dark spots + dull skin while conditioning your lashes for a brighter, more youthful look. Why you need it: Uneven tone + texture rob skin of its natural, healthy-looking glow. This brightening and lash-boosting bundle prevents future discoloration from forming, pairing perfectly with fuller, longer, darker-looking lashes + brows. Instantly brighten, prevent different types of discoloration and visibly evening out skin tone.

skinhair.title: UNBLEMISH + Lash Boost Special
skinhair.description: Less pimples, longer lashes. Get noticeably clearer, brighter, younger-looking skin plus the appearance of lush, longer, fuller-looking lashes.
skinhair.details: What it is: Save 20% when you bundle the UNBLEMISH Regimen with R+F Lash Boost! Clear adult acne + visibly improve signs of aging while enhancing the appearance of longer, darker, fuller lashes. Why you need it: Clogged pores happen when there is a build-up of excess oil, debris and dead skin cells. This age-fighting your clearest-looking skin and the appearance of lusher lashes + brows.

skinhair.title: RECHARGE + Lash Boost Special
skinhair.description: Luminous skin + longer-looking lashes. Get a glowing, luminous look plus the appearance of lush, fuller-looking lashes with this set.
skinhair.details: What it is: Save 20% when you bundle the RECHARGE Regimen with R+F Lash Boost! Fight dullness, dryness and more skin issues that pop up in your 20s while conditioning your lashes to reveal a more energized look. Why you need it: Everyday stressors like UVA/UVB rays, lack of sleep, stress and diet affect skin’s radiance. This skin and lash-boosting bundle supercharges skin’s defenses and promotes fuller, longer, darker-looking lashes + brows.
